work_habits.meeting_preferences: Minimizes meetings; prefers 30‑minute stand‑ups and bi‑weekly 1:1s; only essential face‑to‑face when deep‑dive required
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (3 days remote, 2 days in office)
work_habits.focus_time_requirements: 2 blocks of 90 minutes per day protected for deep work

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven, prefers structured analysis before consensus
personality.risk_tolerance: Moderate – will pilot new processes on a small scale before full rollout
personality.collaboration_style: Task‑oriented, values clear roles and accountability
personality.stress_management_approach: Scheduled micro‑breaks, uses Pomodoro technique, practices mindfulness 10 min daily
personality.conflict_resolution_style: Direct but diplomatic – addresses issues early with factual evidence

other_commitments: Quarterly MBA alumni networking events (2‑3 hrs each)
Volunteer mentor for local coding bootcamp (4 hrs/month)
availability.travel_flexibility: Up to 25% travel (primarily domestic client site visits, max 3 weeks per quarter)

personal_factors.commute_situation: 30‑minute drive to office; flexible parking stipend
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aiming for Senior Operations Manager role within 3‑4 years; driven by process optimization and cross‑functional impact

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: 1‑2 short syncs per week per project; avoids ad‑hoc long meetings
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct yet constructive; prefers written feedback for clarity
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Runs monthly 'Ops Tips' newsletter; maintains shared SOP library

potential_bottlenecks: Heavy reliance on her for SLA reporting during peak months
Limited delegation on high‑visibility stakeholder communications
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Operations Analyst (e.g., Alex Martinez) trained on reporting dashboards
burnout_risk_factors: High self‑imposed standards leading to overtime during release cycles
Limited buffer time on schedule for unexpected incidents
